docs.lead_paragraph: " I THINK a mother should be very kind. They should live in the country. They should let their children have at least five boy and girl horses, five boy and girl dogs and five boy and girl cats. Mothers should make breakfast, lunch and supper.
docs.abstract: D Barclay on girls' ideas of mother's role
docs.snippet: " I THINK a mother should be very kind. They should live in the country. They should let their children have at least five boy and girl horses, five boy and girl dogs and five boy and girl cats. Mothers should make breakfast, lunch and supper.
